titles.title: Expressing support for the recognition of September 7, 2024, as "Liturgical Dance Day" and the International Dance Commission, and for other purposes.
Expressing support for the recognition of September 7, 2024, as "Liturgical Dance Day" and the International Dance Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes Liturgical Dance Day and the International Dance Commission and its contributions to the creative arts and worship in communities across Georgia.
